mapper.select: SELECT MESSAGE_TITLE, MEM.MEMBER_NICKNAME, MESSAGE_CONTENT, MESSAGE_CREATE_TIME FROM TBL_MESSAGE MES JOIN TBL_RECEIVED_MESSAGE RM ON RM.MESSAGE_ID = MES.ID AND MES.MEMBER_RECEIVED_ID = #{id} JOIN TBL_MEMBER MEM ON MEM.ID = MES.MEMBER_RECEIVED_ID
SELECT MEMBER_NICKNAME, MESSAGE_CREATE_TIME, MESSAGE_TITLE, MESSAGE_CONTENT FROM TBL_MEMBER MEM JOIN TBL_MESSAGE MES ON MEM.ID = MES.MEMBER_RECEIVED_ID AND MES.ID = #{id}

SELECT MESSAGE_TITLE, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MESSAGE_CONTENT, MESSAGE_CREATE_TIME FROM TBL_MESSAGE MES JOIN TBL_SENT_MESSAGE SM ON SM.MESSAGE_ID = MES.ID AND MES.MEMBER_SENT_ID = #{id} JOIN TBL_MEMBER MEM ON MEM.ID = MES.MEMBER_SENT_ID
SELECT MEMBER_NICKNAME, MESSAGE_CREATE_TIME, MESSAGE_TITLE, MESSAGE_CONTENT FROM TBL_MEMBER MEM JOIN TBL_MESSAGE MES ON MEM.ID = MES.MEMBER_SENT_ID AND MES.ID = #{id}
